line.comment: * updates tax efficiency on all player sectors. Frequently called by ZH.Monitor
* current tax efficiency is always trending up or down slowly to a target efficiency which is also updated by this script
* added two digits to the interger, simulating decimals for more accurate growth over time example -> 21243 = 212,43%
* Mordan9
* $outpost = find station: sector=$sector class or type={Player Outpost} race=[Player] flags=null refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=1 refpos=null
* base efficiency target is 1000.00
* -50.00 efficiency for every owned sector (small empires grow faster)
* -100.00 efficiency X average jump distance to other sectors (well connected empires grow faster. A direct jump beacon route counts as 1 jump)
* +3% efficiency for every local station (more developed sectors grow faster)
* +20% efficiency target for local jump beacon
* tax efficiency gets extremely throttled until player completes nation goals
* current efficiency
* tax efficiency is constantly shifting
* each update cycle reduces the gap between our target efficiency and actual current efficiency by %7
* but shrinking efficiency happens at 0.35%
* negative tax efficiency gets incremented up to zero. The value is equal to the number of remaining update cycles until first tax income begins to flow
* Tax Perk ensures a minimum 100% tax efficiency
* tutorial message.
* Add-Ons 1.3: No tutorial on insane.
* Outpost manager displays ratings about how well the current empire layout is for tax efficiency growth
* small empire is better
* close together or well connected with jump beacons is better
* more stations is better

sval.val: Прыжковая станция
Налог
updates tax efficiency on all player sectors. Frequently called by ZH.Monitor
current tax efficiency is always trending up or down slowly to a target efficiency which is also updated by this script
added two digits to the interger, simulating decimals for more accurate growth over time example -> 21243 = 212,43%
$outpost = find station: sector=$sector class or type={Player Outpost} race=[Player] flags=null refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=1 refpos=null
base efficiency target is 1000.00
-50.00 efficiency for every owned sector (small empires grow faster)
-100.00 efficiency X average jump distance to other sectors (well connected empires grow faster. A direct jump beacon route counts as 1 jump)
+3% efficiency for every local station (more developed sectors grow faster)
+20% efficiency target for local jump beacon
tax efficiency gets extremely throttled until player completes nation goals
current efficiency
tax efficiency is constantly shifting
each update cycle reduces the gap between our target efficiency and actual current efficiency by %7
but shrinking efficiency happens at 0.35%
negative tax efficiency gets incremented up to zero. The value is equal to the number of remaining update cycles until first tax income begins to flow
Tax Perk ensures a minimum 100% tax efficiency
tutorial message.
Add-Ons 1.3: No tutorial on insane.
Outpost manager displays ratings about how well the current empire layout is for tax efficiency growth
small empire is better
close together or well connected with jump beacons is better
more stations is better
